timeline.message: SimpleUDF support array and map, add test cases

timeline.bodyText: Why do we still need these changes? Actually I think this method is no longer needed

replies.bodyText: Ok, I will remove the method.

timeline.bodyText: Why we allow a 1.0 delta here? And I think 3.0f should be the expected value and udf.eval(3.0f) should be the actual value.
timeline.author: lirui-apache

replies.bodyText:
the function need a positive delta
static public void assertEquals(float expected, float actual, float delta)
asserts that two floats are equal to within a positive delta.
I have set delta to 0
replies.author: z8r-coder
